data.message: Add artifact linkage to PendingReward for deterministic reopen matching: Added artifact_type and artifact_id fields to PendingReward, updated record_provisional_success, cancel_pending_reward with match priority (artifact linkage > action_id > generic), updated handle_reopen_event with match_method tracking, added persistence, 4 new tests (28 total). Pushed to .agent repo.
